amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit any of the funds made available in the Act from being used for the sale or slaughter of wild free-roaming horses and burros (as defined in Public Law 92-195.).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Rahall.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
